publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1572.1 Dennis Canavan: Rights of the Parliament—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1572) in the name of Donald Gorrie, insert at end "but demands that any sanction imposed by the Presiding Officer or his Deputies, should not deprive the Parliament of the opportunity to question the Scottish Executive on policy statements."

S1M-1572.1 Dennis Canavan: Rights of the Parliament—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1572) in the name of Donald Gorrie, insert at end "but demands that any sanction imposed by the Presiding Officer or his Deputies should not deprive the Parliament of the opportunity to question the Scottish Executive on policy statements."
S1M-1572.1 Rights of the Parliament (lodged on 24 January 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-1572.1 Rights of the Parliament (lodged on 24 January 2001) Alex Neil*

S1M-1572.1 Dennis Canavan: Rights of the Parliament—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1572) in the name of Donald Gorrie, insert at end "but demands that any sanction imposed by the Presiding Officer or his Deputies should not deprive the Parliament of the opportunity to question the Scottish Executive on policy statements." Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing
S1M-1572.1 Rights of the Parliament (lodged on 24 January 2001) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1572.1 Dennis Canavan: Rights of the Parliament—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1572) in the name of Donald Gorrie, insert at end "but demands that any sanction imposed by the Presiding Officer or his Deputies should not deprive the Parliament of the opportunity to question the Scottish Executive on policy statements." Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tommy Sheridan
